item.title: Potatomath P0
item.description: Background #Some time ago, a friend of mine posited a thought-provoking question: if he only bought potatoes to feed his family of five, what was the minimum dollar amount that he could feed his family for in a given month?

item.title: An Idiot's Journey into Automation with Ansible
